article_text:
ORGANIZING TOOLS: Stillman & Birn Wirebound Sketchbook and Pilot Bravo!

I hate digital calendars, so I use pen and paper or the palm of my hand for my daily schedule. I get much more satisfaction out of physically crossing things out than deleting. My favorite pen lately has been the Pilot Bravo!, and I use a blank Stillman & Birn...

twitter.description: The architect of Diller Scofidio + Renfro on the joy of traveling with a giant laptop and conversing in loud restaurants using a cellphone.
twitter.title: Architect Elizabeth Diller's Tech Essentials
